attributes.action: Stop the increase of £9000 allowance on expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
MPs ignore public anger and give themselves £9,000 expenses.
MPs have ignored public opinion over the expenses system by quietly introducing new rules which allow them to claim up to £9,125 a year without producing any receipts.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
